snippet.title: Sega Mega Drive: Lotus II 2 RECS
snippet.description:
http://www.Insert-Disk.com proudly presents Lotus II (2) RECS for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis.

Levels 1-4 played just for fun, enjoy!

Lotus II RECS is the continuation of the popular Lotus series. Fast paced 2D retro racing action. Although perhaps not the best in the series it certainly still has the ability to entertain. I hadn't played this on in a while, the rain and ice levels in particular were very bad for my eyes :-)
